meanings.definition: To remove the vocal cords of an animal, typically a dog, in order to reduce or eliminate its ability to bark.
meanings.sent1: The vet will be devocalizing the noisy dog tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: Some people believe devocalizing dogs is inhumane.
meanings.sent3: After devocalizing the dog, it communicated through gestures.
meanings.sent4: The decision to devocalize the dog was like silencing a loudspeaker.
meanings.sent5: The process of devocalizing the dog was done with precision and care.

meanings.definition: The act of rendering an animal unable to vocalize by surgical means.
meanings.sent1: Devocalizing is a controversial practice in the animal welfare community.
meanings.sent2: The devocalizing of the dog was met with mixed reactions.
meanings.sent3: The devocalizing of the parrot left it in a state of confusion.
meanings.sent4: The devocalizing of the cat was like muting a feline opera singer.
meanings.sent5: The devocalizing of the rabbit was a last resort to maintain peace in the neighborhood.
